title: New: Majical Cloudz – Are You Alone
body:
The new **Majical Cloudz** album (Are You Alone? out 16 October via Matador) is shaping up to be an absolute heartbreaker.

The title track, just released today, is another searingly honest ballad, and whilst sombre in tone, almost feels like a call to arms, a plea to keep going, no matter how bleak life may seem at times. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
